skillTree.name: Barded Ithilmar Steed
skillTree.description: An extremely light yet resilient material, Ithilmar gives the same protection as heavy steel, but without slowing down its wearer.

skillTree.name: Stormwing
skillTree.description: Together with Stormwing, Eltharion cuts through Ulthuan’s foes like a wind of blades as the mighty Griffon rakes and claws with savagery.

skillTree.name: Speed of Asuryan
skillTree.description: The High Elves possess a natural skill that far outstrips the prowess of ordinary mortals.

skillTree.name: Ward of Loec
skillTree.description: The Trickster God knows all manner of ploys and ruses that can be used to counter missile attacks.

skillTree.name: Ward of Hoeth
skillTree.description: Knowledge can be used as a shield against magical attack.

skillTree.name: Storm of Blades
skillTree.description: Steel that bites deeper than the flesh.

skillTree.name: Break Upon the Walls
skillTree.description: When no fixture presents itself, one must simply make their own.

effects.description:
Ability: "Unending Volley" for missile units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Wallwarden
skillTree.description: These walls have stood since ages past, and they will not fall until this world crumbles into nothing!

effects.description:
Construction cost: -25% for Wall and Garrison buildings
	(all provinces)

Armour: +10 for all units when defending
	(Lord's army)

Construction time: -2 for Wall and Garrison buildings
	(all provinces)

skillTree.name: A World Asunder
skillTree.description: No being is above suspicion, no motive shall remain hidden. No peace without war.

skillTree.name: Unyielding March
skillTree.description: No dark corner of the world will serve to hide you from the Mistwalkers.

skillTree.name: Grim Discipline
skillTree.description: The Elves of Tor Yvresse contain a deep hatred, war has scarred their hearts and steeled their souls. Tor Yvresse will not fall again.

effects.description:
Replaces: "Martial Mastery and Martial Prowess"
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Dedicated to Ladrielle
skillTree.description: The Lady of Mists is a patron of the hidden and the lost. Her presence is felt most strongly within the mists of Yvresse, where she is said to guide wanderers to safety.

effects.description:
Vigour loss reduction: -10% for Mistwalkers units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +5% for Mistwalkers units
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +5% for Mistwalkers units
	(Lord's army)

Recruitment cost: -10% for all Mistwalker units
	(Lord's army)

Attribute: Stalk for Mistwalkers units
	(Lord's army)

Vigour loss reduction: -20% for Mistwalkers units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +10% for Mistwalkers units
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +10% for Mistwalkers units
	(Lord's army)

Recruitment cost: -20% for all Mistwalker units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Swordplayer
skillTree.description: The sword is the axis of the world and its power is absolute.

skillTree.name: Valour of Ages
skillTree.description: Panic and fear are things that happen to others.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +10% when fighting against Dark Elves
Weapon strength: +15% when fighting against Greenskins, Skaven, Dark Elves, Warriors of Chaos, Norsca and Beastmen

skillTree.name: Hard to Hit
skillTree.description: Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.

skillTree.name: Blade Master
skillTree.description: This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.

skillTree.name: Devastating Charge
skillTree.description: Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.

skillTree.name: Foe-Seeker
skillTree.description: From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.

skillTree.name: Wound-Maker
skillTree.description: Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.

skillTree.name: Full Plate Armour
skillTree.description: Full-Plate armour protects the wearer from head-to-foot. Many such suits are blessed or imbued with arcane abilities.

skillTree.name: Blade Shield
skillTree.description: A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.

skillTree.name: Expeditious Endeavour
skillTree.description: What the enemy cannot see, it cannot hit. What the enemy cannot see, it cannot survive.

skillTree.name: Deadly Onslaught
skillTree.description: The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.

ui_effects.description: Units won't regenerate if cap was reached
Units won't regenerate if cap was reached

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Tempest Upgraded"

skillTree.name: Earthing
skillTree.description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.

skillTree.name: Magical Reserves
skillTree.description: A few magic-users have the ability to store the Winds of Magic for later use, increasing their spellcasting power when it really counts.

ui_effects.description: ➕ 100% chance to deal 50 direct damage to 1 entity per second
➕ 100% chance to deal 50 direct damage to 1 entity per second
➕ 100% chance to deal 50 direct damage to 1 entity per second
➕ 100% chance to deal 50 direct damage to 1 entity per second

ui_effects.description: ➕ Improves power recharge rate by 1 every 7 seconds

skillTree.name: Inspiring Presence
skillTree.description: There are Lords that radiate power, confidence and fear, inspiring their followers to great or terrible acts.

skillTree.name: Militia Master
skillTree.description: Turning an untrained bunch of regular citizens into effective fighting units requires a special kind of talent, and oodles of patience.

effects.description:
Melee defence: +2 for Spearmen, Silverin Guard, Rangers, Archers and Lothern Sea Guard units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +4 for Spearmen, Silverin Guard, Rangers, Archers and Lothern Sea Guard units
	(Lord's army)

	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +6 for Spearmen, Silverin Guard, Rangers, Archers and Lothern Sea Guard units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Bow Master
skillTree.description: Missile combat isn't always about attacking; knowing how to defend also pays dividends.

effects.description:
Ammunition: +8% for Archers, Lothern Sea Guard, Gate Guard, Shadow Warriors, Shadow-walkers/striders, Sisters of Avelorn and Bolt Thrower units
	(Lord's army)

Ammunition: +12% for Archers, Lothern Sea Guard, Gate Guard, Shadow Warriors, Shadow-walkers/striders, Sisters of Avelorn and Bolt Thrower units
	(Lord's army)

	(Lord's army)

Reload time reduction: +10% for Archers, Lothern Sea Guard, Gate Guard, Shadow Warriors, Shadow-walkers/striders, Sisters of Avelorn and Bolt Thrower units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Cavalry Master
skillTree.description: Years of experience in mounted combat has started to pay off; this one is always in command of both their force and its steeds.

effects.description:
Speed: +5% for Ellyrian Reavers and Silver Helms units
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +5% for Ellyrian Reavers units
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +10% for Ellyrian Reavers and Silver Helms units

	(Lord's army)

	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Vanguard Master
skillTree.description: Being present at the very forefront of the assault, on many occasions, prepares one for future engagements of a similar nature.

effects.description:
Charge bonus: +5 for Chariot, Skycutter, War Lion and Dragon Princes units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +4 for Chariot, War Lion and Dragon Princes units
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +5% for Tiranoc Chariot and Skycutter units
	(Lord's army)

	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +20 for Chariot, Skycutter, War Lion and Dragon Princes units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Sky Master
skillTree.description: The firmament holds no fear for this one, such is their command of the many airborne beasts of battle.

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +3% for Great Eagle, Phoenix and Dragon units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +5% for Great Eagle, Phoenix and Dragon units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +10 for Great Eagle, Phoenix and Dragon units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +10% for Great Eagle, Phoenix and Dragon units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +20 for Great Eagle, Phoenix and Dragon units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Master Strategist
skillTree.description: Knowing that it is the rare plan that survives contact with the enemy, yet being prepared for all eventualities, raises this one above mere planners.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +2 for Swordmasters of Hoeth, White Lions of Chrace and Phoenix Guard units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +4 for Swordmasters of Hoeth, White Lions of Chrace and Phoenix Guard units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +4 for Swordmasters of Hoeth, White Lions of Chrace and Phoenix Guard units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +6 for Swordmasters of Hoeth, White Lions of Chrace and Phoenix Guard units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +6 for Swordmasters of Hoeth, White Lions of Chrace and Phoenix Guard units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Immovable Force
skillTree.description: Like a wall of the hardest stone imaginable - such is their ability to withstand attack.

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +10% for Spearmen, Silverin Guard, Silver Helms, Swordmasters of Hoeth and White Lions of Chrace units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +5 for Spearmen, Silverin Guard, Silver Helms, Swordmasters of Hoeth and White Lions of Chrace units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Magic resistance: 15% for Spearmen, Silverin Guard, Silver Helms, Swordmasters of Hoeth and White Lions of Chrace units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Favourable Winds
skillTree.description: When the gale always blows in the direction of your choosing, failure becomes a rare event indeed.

effects.description:
Missile strength: +10% for Archers and Lothern Sea Guard, Gate Guard, Shadow Warriors, Shadow-walkers/striders, Sisters of Avelorn and Bolt Thrower units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +10 for Archers, Lothern Sea Guard, Gate Guard, Shadow Warriors, Shadow-walkers/striders, Sisters of Avelorn and Bolt Thrower units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Missile resistance: 10% for Archers, Lothern Sea Guard, Gate Guard, Shadow Warriors, Shadow-walkers/striders, Sisters of Avelorn and Bolt Thrower units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Silver Torrent
skillTree.description: Speed, agility and control - all must be mastered if your crushing tide is to break perfectly upon enemy shores.

effects.description:
Speed: +15% for Rangers, Great Eagle, War Lion, Chariot, Skycutter and Ellyrian Reavers units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +10% for Rangers, Great Eagle, War Lion, Chariot, Skycutter and Ellyrian Reavers units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Missile resistance: +15% for Rangers, Great Eagle, War Lion, Chariot, Skycutter and Ellyrian Reavers units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Heart of the Flame
skillTree.description: The very centre of the fire always burns the hottest.

effects.description:
Armour: +10 for Dragon, Phoenixes, Dragon Princes and Phoenix Guard units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +5 for Dragon, Phoenixes, Dragon Princes and Phoenix Guard units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Physical resistance: 10% for Dragon, Phoenixes, Dragon Princes and Phoenix Guard units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Route Marcher
skillTree.description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.

skillTree.name: Iron Disciplinarian
skillTree.description: This Lord expects utter obedience from the smallfolk, and has little time for insurrections or petty revolts.

skillTree.name: Merchant Lord
skillTree.description: “Underlying most arguments against the free market is a lack of belief in freedom itself.”

skillTree.name: Bonded Service
skillTree.description: The Lords rule, the peasants toil. Nothing has changed in over a thousand years.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +25
	(Lord's army)

Recruitment cost: -5% for all units
	(Lord's army)

Unit experience gain per turn: +50
	(Lord's army)

Recruitment cost: -10% for all units
	(Lord's army)

Unit experience gain per turn: +100
	(Lord's army)

Recruitment cost: -20% for all units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Wary
skillTree.description: This warrior has been ambushed previously and got themselves and many of their compatriots away safely. Such things make one naturally suspicious.

skillTree.name: Draftmaster
skillTree.description: Someone has to ensure the numbers and quality of recruits remain high.

skillTree.name: Lightning Strike
skillTree.description: "The time to strike is now!"

effects.description: Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present

skillTree.name: Quartermaster
skillTree.description: A good quartermaster can ration equipment and foodstuffs efficiently, making supplies last longer.

skillTree.name: Elven Healing
skillTree.description: The ancient Asur arts teach one how to heal as well as how to harm.

effects.description:
Attrition: -3% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

Attrition: -8% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

Attrition: -15% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Elven Scholar
skillTree.description: Far removed from the petty squabbles of other races, many High Elves are able to devote themselves to learning, magic and the arts.

skillTree.name: Renowned & Feared
skillTree.description: This Lord's many deeds - both on and off the battlefield - have brought them renown among their allies and made them feared by their enemies.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +10% chance of wounding aggressors

Recruit rank: +1 for all units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Maintenance
skillTree.description: FACTIONWIDE: all source of income: -0,5% and characters upkeep: +1%. Effects are additive. Negated on level 30 of character.

ui_effects.description: Units won't regenerate if cap was reached

backgroundSkills.name: Warden of Tor Yvresse
backgroundSkills.description: "Pointy-ead'' is legendary among the Greenskins, who both fear and respect his martial prowess.

ui_effects.description: ➕ Enemies hit by bombardment in melee combat
➕ Calls down 15 projectiles each dealing 0 0 damage and 0 50 explosion damage (2m)

effects.description:
Immune to Barren Wasteland attrition
	(Lord's army)

Leadership: +5 for Spear Infantry and Ranger units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +5 for Spear Infantry and Rangers units
	(Lord's army)

Attribute: Causes Fear when fighting against Greenskins
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +10 for all Mistwalker units
	(Lord's army)

items.name: Fangsword of Eltharion
items.description: This rune-encrusted longsword has been passed down through Eltharion’s family for generations, bestowing unto him the zeal of his forefathers.

items.name: Helm of Yvresse
items.description: The ceremonial crown of he who protects Yvresse’s ancient metropolis is an inspirational symbol of dogged determination.

ui_effects.description: ➕Entities cannot die while ability is active
